text: Lohja () is a city in Uusimaa, Finland. As of January 2014 almost 48,000 people live there. Nearby municipalities are Inkoo, Karkkila, Raasepori, Siuntio, Vihti, Salo, Somero and Tammela. In 2009, Sammatti became a part of Lohja. In 2013, the former municipalities of Karjalohja and Nummi-Pusula were merged with Lohja. A large cave is located in Lohja. The people in Lohja speak two languages: Finnish and Swedish. ==Other websites== * Community website Category:Cities in Finland Category:Municipalities of Uusimaa
title: Lohja
